title: Mathematics Flash CardsAn Innovative Solution To Family Bonding
text:
(MENAFN Press) October 18 2015 - Saratoga FL - In today’s hectic technologically driven society it can be difficult to get the family together to interact with each other. Parents tend to be preoccupied with their jobs running the household
and paying bills. Whereas children are focused on school playing with friends and finding out more about the environment and the world they are in. One company Simply Clever Cards has provided a way to bring educational and interactive fun into the family and improve bonding and relationships.
The company has recently launched their product called Simply Clever Arithmetic Cards. These multiplication flash cards are an educational tool developed to assist in improving the critical arithmetic skills in young people. The product was manufactured to be used by children aged seven years and older. However it can be brought out for playful fun for the entire family.
Family bonding times can become engaging quality time together. Multiplication flash cards can bring homeschooling to the fore but also makes for a unique opportunity for families to get together. These flash cards can be used in a variety of settings. They can be useful for family trips and outings. The multiplication flash cards can be used during barbecues beach outings and picnics. It can even be a great way to get everyone interacting at a child’s birthday party.
Playing games in these different environments are possible because the flash cards can be used to play regular card games. The Old Maid Memory Go Fish Crazy Eights and War. The deck of cards comes with a user guide showing various ways to utilize the arithmetic card for games. Family members can choose from a wide variety of games and play with hours of fun.
While the family is bonding and interacting playing with the multiplication flash cards allow the younger children to learn quite a lot about the common core concepts in mathematics. Playing with the . The child who plays with the Simply Clever Arithmetic Cards can enhance their comprehension of numbers while learning addition subtraction multiplication and division. The flash cards also offer a stimulating way to engage children in other key mathematical concepts such as fractions.
According to Simply Clever Cards the usage of the multiplication cards will not only enhance knowledge and understanding in arithmetic it will improve the cognitive and problem solving abilities of the user. While engaging with family members the flash cards can also improve social interaction skills of children. Children can also get to enhance their decision making skills as they engage and learn mathematical skills and better comprehend numbers.
